source:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SEQ_00Qhoterl Pasol has a message she looks eager to share with you.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラスでのみ進行します。

ホパル古盤のコテルリ・パソリは、言付けを預かっているようだ。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_TODO_01<tab>Ride the Great Vessel of Ronka to Fruit of the Protector and use its Peculiar Light ability at the designated location.
target: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_TODO_01<tab>水蛇様の壺に騎乗して<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAF7601 /var>に不思議な光を行う

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000<tab>Ah, such splendid timing! It would seem your singular ability to coax the great serpent into obedience with a mere whistle has made you quite the commodity. Uterl Matl was just asking after you, and requested that I send you his way with haste. The matter seemed quite urgent─so urgent, in fact, that he ran off before I had a chance to inquire as to the details!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_000ウテルリ・マトルが、水蛇様の魔笛を操ることのできる、
)) (( )) 02 /var>殿に用向きがあるそうで～。
事情までは存じませぬが、話を聞いてやってくださいましな～。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_010<tab>Ah, good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, let me thank you for answering my summons on such short notice. My time spent with the great serpent has given me a certain intuition when it comes to anticipating its needs, and recently I've noticed something peculiar about its behavior.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_010ご足労ありがとうございまする！
実は……壺入りの水蛇様との付き合いが長くなったおかげか、
最近、御心がわかるようになってきたのでございまする！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_011<tab>It fidgets inside the vase restlessly, but I don't sense that it yearns for freedom. No, this is another matter entirely. It wishes to free something from within <var 1A 02 /var>itself<var 1A 01 /var>─doubtless that mystifying light it has a habit of disgorging from its eyes.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_011つい先ほども、つぶらな瞳で見つめられまして……。
おそらく水蛇様ゆかりの地である「水蛇の宝卵」にて、
思い切り「不思議な光」を放ちたいのでございましょう！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_012<tab>I must admit I am grateful for the serpent's forbearance in the matter, when it is we who are obliged to serve. And serve we shall─with your help, of course. Pray bring the serpent to Fruit of the Protector, where it can shed light to its little heart's content.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_012その意図まではわかりかねまするが、
水蛇様が、そうしたいとお考えであれば、従うべきと存じまする！
魔笛を操り、「不思議な光」の力を解き放ってくだされ～！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_013<tab>You've arrived just in time! The great serpent is full to bursting with that mysterious light, and I'd be loath to find out what happens were we to let it build up any further. Go on now, you know what to do.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_013今回も、水蛇様のストレス解消……いや失礼……
御身に溜まった、神秘の御力の解放を、お願いいたしまする！
魔笛を操り、「不思議な光」の力を解き放ってくだされ～！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_014<tab>Best not leave the great serpent alone for too long─I dread to think what would happen if it was forced to contain itself any longer. Just blow on the whistle here and guide it to Fruit of the Protector so it can do what it needs to do.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_014水蛇様の壺にお乗りになるのですね？
ロンカの魔笛はこちらにご用意しておりまする。
魔笛を操り、「不思議な光」の力を解き放ってくだされ～！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>A brilliant flash of light accompanies the release of unmeasurable quantities of magical energy. The great serpent appears content with itself.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SYSTEM_000_020まばゆい光と共に、神秘の力が放出された！
水蛇様は、何かをやり遂げた表情をしている……ように見える！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SYSTEM_100_020<tab>The air here is teeming with magical energy. This might be the perfect place to let the great serpent do its business.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SYSTEM_100_020神秘的な息吹を感じる場所だ。
水蛇様の力を解放するには最適かもしれない……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SYSTEM_110_020<tab>Speak with Uterl Matl at Hopl's Stopple to mount the Great Vessel of Ronka, and unleash its peculiar light into the area around Fruit of the Protector.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_SYSTEM_110_020ホパル古盤の「ウテルリ・マトル」に話しかけ、
水蛇様の壺に騎乗し、「不思議な光」を放ってみよう。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_021<tab>Now there's my favorite little serpent! And it looks so accomplished, so <var 1A 02 /var>great<var 1A 01 /var>! I believe a treat is in order. As for <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> treat, my good <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, Qhoterl Pasol may be able to help you with that!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_UTERLMATL_000_021ありがとうございまする！
水蛇様も、とても喜んでおられるようで、ご機嫌でございまする！
「コテルリ・パソリ」に報告して、報酬を受け取ってくださいまし！

source:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030I trust Uterl Matl's task was not too daunting...
Oh, I see! What an unorthodox request. However, it seems that Uterl Matl, and more importantly the great serpent, were more than pleased with your performance.
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_030ウテルリ・マトルの頼みを聞いてくださり、感謝でございまする～！
水蛇様も、きっと喜んでおられることでしょ～！
わたくしには、水蛇様の意図はさっぱりわかりませぬが……。

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_031<tab>Humble creatures such as we are can but guess as to the serpent's wishes, and carry them out as dutifully as we can manage. In that respect, I believe we have done splendidly!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_031ですが、水蛇様は超常の存在であられまする～。
きっと、わたくしどもでは計り知れない何かを察知し、
対処してくださったのでございましょ～！

source: TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_032<tab>You should be honored to have been given this task, and should you be asked to undertake it once more, I suggest you treat it with the same gravity as you did today. So long as the great serpent is happy, the Qitari are happy─and that should make you happy, old <var 08 E905 ((chapette)) ((chap)) /var>!
target:
TEXT_BANQIQ127_03832_QHOTERLPASOL_000_032とにかく、スッキリした水蛇様の表情を見れば、
間違いなく、良いことをしたのだとわかりまする～。
水蛇様ったら、生き生きとした、とても良い目でございました～！
